This as Wagner Group leader Yevgeny Prigozhin says that the handover of the city to Russian forces will be completed by the 1st of June.

sentences.sentence: Founder of the extremist group Oath Keepers, Stuart Rhodes, has been sentenced to 18 years in prison for his participation in the January 6th Capitol riots in Washington.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: After his sentencing, Rhodes claimed that he was a political prisoner, a sentiment that the U.S. District Judge disputed, but his lawyer repeated.

sentences.sentence: Both governments angrily deny playing any role. Fifteen people dead, some 20,000 displaced and livelihoods in tatters. These are some of the devastating effects of the floods in the Emilia-Romagna region in northern Italy.

It's standardized for every disaster the same, but then there needs to be the damage assessment so that we get a clearer idea about what could be our European contribution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As stated by EU Commission President von der Leyen, the EU will remain by Italy's side during the emergency. And EU Commission President von der Leyen also confirmed that the EU will provide financial help to support the country as it deals with the emergency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But given that extreme weather events like this one are becoming more frequent in Europe, the EU will have to deal with them not just in Italy, but in other parts of Europe too.
